verbose_text: For example, activation of vascular endothelial growth factor receptor (VEGFR)-2/-3 signaling by gradients of VEGF-A/-C ligand promotes selection of specialized " tip " ECs, which are highly motile and lead new blood vessel branches (XREF_FIG A).
evidence: vascular endothelial growth factor receptor (VEGFR)-2/-3 signaling by gradients of VEGF-A/-C ligand promotes selection of specialized "tip" ECs
